item.title: Mishra Dhatu Nigam Ltd Gains 11.90%: 5 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Momentum
item.description: Mishra Dhatu Nigam Ltd (MIDHANI) delivered a strong weekly performance from 29 December 2025 to 2 January 2026, rising 11.90% from Rs.318.50 to Rs.356.40. This gain significantly outpaced the Sensex’s 1.35% advance over the same period, reflecting robust investor interest amid mixed technical signals and elevated trading volumes. The week was marked by notable intraday highs, heavy institutional participation, and a complex technical landscape signalling both momentum and caution. Time: 4 minutes ago

item.title: E2E Networks Ltd Falls 1.14%: 2 Key Technical Signals Driving the Week
item.description: E2E Networks Ltd closed the week marginally lower by 1.14%, ending at Rs.2,027.50 on 2 January 2026, underperforming the Sensex which gained 1.35% over the same period. Time: 4 minutes ago

item.title: HDFC Asset Management Gains 0.43%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Week

item.title: Tembo Global Industries Ltd Falls 14.30%: 5 Key Events Shaping the Week

item.title: Manorama Industries Gains 5.50%: 6 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Mixed Momentum
